data.title: Where to stream Richard Curtis' holiday rom-com 'Love Actually'?
data.meta_description: If you are also looking for a perfect movie for this Christmas, "Love Actually" can be your best bet.
data.text:
Synopsis

If you are also looking for a perfect movie for this Christmas, "Love Actually" can be your best bet.

As Christmas approaches, people look for movies perfect for the holiday season. And if you are also searching for that Christmas film, "Love Actually" can be your best option. The director of "Love Actually" is Richard Curtis, who is well-known for the romcom "Notting Hill" and the time-travel film "About Time".

"Love Actually," set in London, narrates ten stories of family, lovers, friends, and strangers and how their relationships can fall under during the holiday season. As the movie progresses, it becomes clear that each story is a part of a bigger picture. The film was released in 2003. The trailer of "Love Actually" also hints at how each story is connected.

"Love Actually" features many actors. In the movie, Hugh Grant plays the role of a newly-elected Prime Minister, David Cameron. Actors Alan Rickman and Emma Thompson play the roles of Harry and Karen, a married couple. "Love Actually" also stars Chiwetel Ejiofor and Keira Knightley as Peter and Juliet, a newlywed couple. Besides, actors Colin Firth (Jamie), Bill Nighy (Billy Mack), Gregor Fisher (Joe), and Liam Neeson (Daniel) are also part of the Christmas film.

A sequel to "Love Actually" was also released in 2017 with the name "Red Nose Day Actually". The 15-minute-long sequel was released as a fundraising event for Red Nose Day.

You can watch "Love Actually" online. The Christmas classic is available to stream on AMC+ as well as Peacock. It is also available to purchase and rent on other online streaming platforms.

FAQs:

What is "Love Actually"?

"Love Actually" is a Christmas classic which was released in 2003.

Who was the director of "Love Actually"?

Richard Curtis directed the movie "Love Actually".
